item.title: Masha add a quote by Stephen King
item.description: "Get busy living or get busy dying." -- Stephen King

item.title: Masha add a quote by Woody Allen
item.description: "Life is full of misery, loneliness, and suffering - and it's all over much too soon." -- Woody Allen

item.title: Masha add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "If you tell the truth, you don't have to remember anything." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Masha add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Go to heaven for the climate and hell for the company." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Masha add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "So far, about morals, I know only that what is moral is what you feel good after and what is immoral is what you feel bad after." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Masha add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "It is awfully easy to be hard-boiled about everything in the daytime, but at night it is another thing." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Masha add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Человек один не может...Все равно человек один не может ни черта" -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Masha add a quote by Ernest Hemingway
item.description: "Человека можно уничтожить, но его нельзя победить." -- Ernest Hemingway

item.title: Masha add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "I have a higher and grander standard of principle than George Washington. He could not lie; I can, but I won't." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Masha add a quote by Milorad Pavic
item.description: "When we read, it is not ours to absorb all that is written. Our thoughts are jealous and they constantly blank out the thoughts of others, for there is not room enough in us for two scents at one time." -- Milorad Pavic

item.title: Masha add a quote by Charles Bukowski
item.description: "It didn't pay to trust another human being. Humans didn't have it, whatever it took." -- Charles Bukowski

item.title: Masha add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "I'm not upset that you lied to me, I'm upset that from now on I can't believe you." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Masha add a quote by William Shakespeare
item.description: "For Brutus, as you know, was Caesar's angel: Judge, O you gods, how dearly Caesar loved him! This was the most unkindest cut of all" -- William Shakespeare

item.title: Masha add a quote by Haruki Murakami
item.description: "Can'ttrustpeople. Won'tdoanygood. They'llkillyoueverytime. They'llkilleachother. They'llkilleveryone." -- Haruki Murakami

item.title: Masha add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "Yet each man kills the thing he loves By each let this be heard Some do it with a bitter look Some with a flattering word The coward does it with a kiss The brave man with a sword" -- Oscar Wilde
